title: Oasis in space: what price progress?
creator_credit: Andrew Solt Productions, Costeau Society Production, Andrew W Sott and Philippe Cousteau
brief_description: Affects of pollution (asbestos) on drinking water in area of Silver bay in US. Goes through how they analyse content of water and methods of how to reverse the situation of environmental disaster. Narrator, Philippe Cousteau.
